SEARCH
Package com.itsradiix.discordwebhook

Class DiscordWebHook

java.lang.Object
com.itsradiix.discordwebhook.DiscordWebHook
public class DiscordWebHook extends Object
DiscordWebhook allows for easy message sending to your Servers through a webhook! This class represents a Discord Webhook Message. Make sure to read (the wiki page on our GitHub) to understand how to use this effectively. Also make sure to understand (Discord's documentation of Webhooks).
Since:
2024-05-19
